title: NextGen Connect & Caffeinate at Serendipity Labs
location: 10000 Avalon Blvd., Suite 100 Alpharetta, GA 30009, USA
description: Join other North Fulton young professionals for networking, coffee, and breakfast at the Greater North Futon Chamber for NextGen Connect & Caffeinate. Build relationships, invest in your own professional development, and develop leads with us. Event registration includes coffee and light breakfast and is open to both Chamber members and non-members. NextGen Connects is a Chamber talent development initiative that serves to engage, recognize, and develop the Greater North Fulton Chamber of Commerce‚Äôs future leaders. This young professionals group is designed for individuals, ages 21 to 40, who are living and/or working in North Fulton. Interested in sponsoring or hosting a NextGen event? title: ProAlliance Networking Meeting
location: 10000 Avalon Blvd., Suite 100 Alpharetta, GA 30009, USA
description: You are invited to be a part of one of the largest networking groups in North Fulton. Build relationships, support professional development, and develop leads. This is an opportunity to network with other Chamber members and guests, share ideas, and grow your business. What to Expect: - Be prepared to speak for ~2 minutes to share more about yourself in a small group setting - Enjoy 6-minute presentations from two GNFCC members (all Chamber Members are eligible) - Be prepared to stand and give a ~25 second elevator pitch to all guests - Opportunity to donate swag items to giveaway to the crowd (simply bring item with you and give to facilitator) Please register by 4pm on the Tuesday prior to the meeting prior to be on the registration list. You may register until the start of the meeting at 7:30am. Registration is required for this event. ProAlliance Coffee Sponsor: 7:30am - 7:45am - Networking 7:45am - Meeting Begins 9:00am ‚Äì Meeting Concludes Events News

title: Strategic Leadership Visit
location: 10000 Avalon Blvd., Suite 100 Alpharetta, GA 30009, USA
description: The Greater North Fulton Chamber‚Äôs Strategic Leadership Visit brings together 40 top leaders from government, business, and education to explore bold ideas and breakthrough initiatives driving success in other communities. Designed to spark collaboration and inspire action, this high-impact trip fosters powerful connections among North Fulton and metro Atlanta leaders‚Äîlaying the groundwork for transformative progress back home. We will be exploring the cities of Scottsdale and Mesa, Arizona- cities known for their innovative approaches to economic development, regional collaboration, smart infrastructure, and arts and tourism investment. This fast-growing, future-focused area offers valuable insights and inspiration as North Fulton continues to shape its own path forward. title: Health & Wellness Seminar - Registered Hands Only: Why Credentials Matter in Medical Imaging"
description: J oin Erika Bongart with Lanier Technical College to learn more about Radiology Technicians and why their role is so important to healthcare. About the presentation : Medical imaging is a vital part of diagnosing everything from broken bones to cancer‚Ä¶but not all imaging is equal. This presentation shines a light on the essential role of Registered Radiologic Technologists, who are Nationally certified experts in safely and accurately producing medical images. Learn how their training in anatomy, radiation safety, and technology ensures the highest standard of care. This presentation explores why choosing credentialed professionals protects patients and supports accurate diagnoses‚Äîbecause when it comes to your health, who takes your image matters. About the speaker : Erika Bongart is a Registered Radiologic Technologist and the Program Director for the Radiologic Technology Associate Degree program at Lanier Technical College. Erika been a member of the Lanier Technical College faculty since 2019, and specializes in pediatric medical imaging. Erika is a proud alumnus of LTC, where she earned an Associate of Applied Science degree in Radiologic Technology. She was awarded a Bachelor

title: Health & Wellness Seminar - Thyroid Cancer in Northeast Georgia
description: About the Presentation: ‚ÄúExceptionally high‚Äù thyroid cancer rates have been reported in many of the counties located in Northeast Georgia. This presentation will examine the epidemiology of thyroid cancer and address the work the University of North Georgia is planning on doing with community partners. About the Speaker: Dr. Neal Lin is an assistant professor in the Biology Department at the University of North Georgia. His expertise is in clinical epidemiology and public health, with a degree in microbiology, epidemiology and medicine. He has worked for about ten years at local and federal public health agencies on emergency preparedness and epidemiology of microbial diseases, including botulism. To register on zoom : Click Here! 230 E.E. Butler Parkway Gainesville, GA 30501 | Phone: (770) 532-6206

title: Small Business Seminar - Fostering a Cybersecure Workspace Culture
description: Free for Chamber Members, Non-Members $15.00. Please RSVP. Join Abdul Hussain, Delta Community Credit Union to talk about "Fostering & Cybersecure Workplace". About the speaker: With multiple industry-leading IT and security certifications, Abdul Hussain has more than 20 years of experience developing IT security strategies and building infrastructure systems for large scale global enterprises. He serves as Vice President of Information Security and CISO for Delta Community Credit Union, Georgia‚Äôs largest credit union and one of the largest credit unions in the nation. Abdul previously served as manager of Technology, Strategy and Operations for Protiviti, where he led teams focusing on optimizing security operations for large financial services companies, as well as energy, healthcare, and hospitality industries. A Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) and a Certified Information Security Manager (CISM), Abdul holds a BS in Information Technology from Southern Polytechnic State University and an MBA from the Georgia Institute of Technology. To register In Person: CLICK HERE To register on zoom: CLICK HERE 230 E.E. Butler Parkway Gainesville, GA 30501 | Phone:
